title: Wonderwall
lyric:
And all the roads we have to walk are winding
And all the lights that lead us there are blinding
There are many things that I would like to say to you
But I don't know how

title: Forrest Gump
stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

title: Redemption Song
lyric:
Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery
None but ourselves can free our minds
Have no fear for atomic energy
'Cause none of them can stop the time

title: Viva La Vida
lyric:
One minute, I held the key
Next the walls were closed on me
And I discovered that my castles stand
Upon pillars of salt and pillars of sand

title: Network
stars: Faye Dunaway, William Holden, Peter Finch
line:
We're all you know.
You're beginning to believe the illusions we're spinning here.
You're beginning to think that the tube is reality,
and that your own lives are unreal.

title: Guardians of The Galaxy
stars: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
stars: Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett, Tilda Swinton
line: For what it's worth: it's never too late or, in my case, too early to be whoever you want to be

title: The Bucket List
stars: Jack Nicholson, Morgan Freeman, Sean Hayes
line:
The simplest thing is, I loved him and I miss him. Carter and I saw the world together. Which is amazing.
When you think that only three months ago, we were complete strangers.

title: The Apartment
stars: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine, Fred MacMurray
line: Ya know, I used to live like Robinson Crusoe; I mean, shipwrecked among 8 million people. And then one day I saw a footprint in the sand, and there you were.

title: Goodbye Stranger
lyric:
Goodbye stranger it's been nice
Hope you find your paradise
Tried to see your point of view
Hope your dreams will all come true

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
stars: Ralph Fiennes, F.Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric
line:
You're looking so well, darling, you really are...
They've done a marvelous job.
I don't know what sort of cream they've put on you down at the morgue,
but... I want some.

title: Inception
stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page
line:
Once an idea has taken hold of the brain it's almost impossible to eradicate.
An idea that is fully formed - fully understood - that sticks; right in there somewhere.

title: Good Riddance (Time of Your Life)
lyric:
So take the photographs and still frames in your mind
Hang it on a shelf in good health and good time
Tattoos of memories, and dead skin on trial
For what it's worth, it was worth all the while

title: Hotel California
lyric:
Last thing I remember, I was running for the door
I had to find the passage back to the place I was before
'Relax,' said the night man, 'We are programmed to receive
You can check out any time you like, but you can never leave'

title: That's Life
lyric:
I've been up and down and over and out
And I know one thing
Each time I find myself layin' 
Flat on my face
I just pick myself up and get
Back in the race

title: Lego Movie
stars: Chris Pratt, Will Ferrell, Elizabeth Banks
line:
If this relationship is going to work out between us I need to feel free to party with a bunch of strangers whenever I feel like it.
I will text you.

title: Wish You Were Here
lyric:
So, so you think you can tell heaven from hell, 
Blue skies from pain
Can you tell a green field from a cold steel rail?
A smile from a veil?
Do you think you can tell?

title: More Than a Feeling
lyric:
So many people have come and gone
Their faces fade as the years go by
Yet I still recall as I wander on
As clear as the sun in the summer sky

title: Time to Pretend
lyric:
Yeah, it's overwhelming,
but what else can we do?
Get jobs in offices
and wake up for the morning commute?

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
stars: Gregory Peck, John Megna, Frank Overton
line: Neighbors bring food with death, and flowers with sickness, and little things in between. Boo was our neighbor. He gave us two soap dolls, a broken watch and chain, a knife, and our lives.

title: Intouchables
stars: Fran√ßois Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny

title: Yesterday
lyric:
Yesterday all my troubles seemed so far away.
Now it looks as though they're here to stay.
Oh, I believe in yesterday.
Suddenly, I'm not half the man I used to be.
There's a shadow hanging over me.
Oh, yesterday came suddenly.

title: Don't Stop Me Now
lyric:
I'm a shooting star, leaping through the sky
Like a tiger defying the laws of gravity
I'm a racing car, passing by like Lady Godiva
I'm gonna go, go, go
There's no stopping me

title: Big Fish
stars: Ewan McGregor, Albert Finney, Billy Crudup
line:
They say when you meet the love of your life,
time stops, and that's true.
What they don't tell you is that when it starts again,
it moves extra fast to catch up.

title: Tootsie
stars: Dustin Hoffman, Jessica Lange, Teri Garr
line: You were a tomato! A tomato doesn't have logic! A tomato can't move!

title: The Prestige
stars: Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson
line:
The magician takes the ordinary something and makes it into something extraordinary.
But you wouldn't clap yet, because making something disappear isn't enough.
You have to bring it back.

title: Imagine
lyric:
You may say I'm a dreamer
But I'm not the only one
I hope someday you'll join us
And the world will be as one

title: Feeling Good
lyric:
Butterflies all out having fun
You know what I mean
Sleep in peace when day is done
And this old world is a new world
And a bold world
For me
